content: this pattern in for a small hat that fits twelve and fourteen inch baby dolls the twelve inch doll i made it for was a corolle baby doll the fourteen inch doll was a lullababy doll i wasn t entirely happy with this project because the top of the hat ends up with a bit the hat that doesn t sit quite right another thing to note is that the hook i used was actually handmade by a friend and may be a slightly different size then your hooks materials needed * loops and threads soft classic acrylic yarn in bright red * loops and threads soft classic acrylic yarn in off white * 5 00mm h crochet hook * stitch markers * tapestry needle you only need a little bit of each color of yarn perfect for scrap yarn projects
